mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cars (car_name, car_number, car_distance, car_year, car_image, car_explain, cop_seq, rsc_seq) VALUES (#{carName}, #{carNumber}, #{carDistance}, #{carYear}, #{carImage}, #{carExplain}, #{copSeq}, #{rscSeq});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_cars ORDER BY car_created DESC

SELECT * FROM tb_cars WHERE car_seq not in( (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} < rsv_end and rsv_end < #{rsvEnd}) union (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} < rsv_start and rsv_end < #{rsvEnd}) union (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} < rsv_start and rsv_start < #{rsvEnd}) union (select rsv_detail from tb_reservations where #{rsvStart} > rsv_start and rsv_end > #{rsvEnd}))
and cop_seq = ${copSeq} and car_state = true;
SELECT * FROM tb_cars WHERE ${columnName} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchString}, '%')
SELECT car_seq, car_name, car_number, car_distance, car_year, car_explain, car_image FROM tb_cars WHERE car_seq = #{carSeq};
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_cars SET car_name = #{carName}, car_number = #{carNumber}, car_distance = #{carDistance}, car_year = #{carYear}, car_explain = #{carExplain}, car_image = #{carImage} WHERE car_seq = #{carSeq};
